From: "dcoburn" <dcoburn@...>

::Dollen::

          Dollen looked at his food.  He transformed to taranturtle mode.
He skuttled around on his legs.  Then he went up to his food.  He rubbed his
two front legs together and said, "Dinner is served!!!!!  Hehehehehe!!!" He
cackled, sounding very much like Tarantulas.  He bit a big chunk out of the
gopher meat with his two spider mandibles, and then another bit with his
turtle jaws.

     "Hmmmm, tasty!!" He said as he transformed and took another bite of the
meat.  He finished his meat, and then looked at GoldenEye.

         "You're quite the hunter, yes," He said, sounding very much like
Megatron.

(OOC: When I say Dollen sounds very much like Tarantulas and Megatron, I
don't mean he sounds exactly like their voice, he just sounds like them in
speaking style in his own voice)
